        Description copied from class: FileIndentOptionsProvider
        Retrieves indent options for PSI file.
        Specified by:
        getIndentOptions in class FileIndentOptionsProvider
        Parameters:
        settings - Code style settings for which indent options are calculated.
        file - The file to retrieve options for.
        Returns:
        Indent options or null if the provider can't retrieve them.
